title: UZIT and LENOX T206s - Harry Steinfeldt PSA 4 & Fred Merkle
author: GoCalBears

posts.post_title: UZIT and LENOX T206s - Harry Steinfeldt PSA 4 & Fred Merkle
posts.post_content:
A high $ card I want for my PC has popped up and I'm accumulating money for that so having to part ways with these guys.

Just looking to get what I have in to these two:

Uzit PSA 4 Harry Steinfeldt (with bat): *SOLD*
Lenox PSA 2.5 Fred Merkle (throwing): $3,250 (net to me)

Prices are firm.
